title: Five-Star Ubud Suite Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Unlimited Bali Zoo Access
description: Indulge in five-star jungle bliss at Sanctoo Suites & Villas, a serene sanctuary tucked away in the region of Gianyar, adjacent to Bali Zoo and around 20 minutes from Ubud's centre. This peaceful patch is inspired by nature, with a lagoon pool that mimics the water holes of the African savannah and tranquil vistas over the Wos River. Revive your senses at Sanctoo Spa with a massage or organic facial, or visit The Cassowary Restaurant for wholesome Balinese and international dishes with a focus on fresh organic ingredients. Looking for things to do? Get up close and personal with the animals that call Bali Zoo home or take the complimentary shuttle to the nearby village of Singapadu.
offer_address: Jalan Ulun Suwi II, Singapadu, Sukawati, Bali 80582, Indonesia

title: Sophisticated Family-Friendly Ubud Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Cocktails Plus Unlimited Bali Zoo Access
description:
Indulge in sophisticated jungle bliss with a serene sanctuary escape tucked away in the region of Gianyar, adjacent to Bali Zoo and a 20-minute drive from Ubud's centre. Inspired by nature, with a lagoon pool that mimics the watering holes of the African savannah and tranquil vistas over the Wos River, Sanctoo Suites and Villas delivers a uniquely calm family-friendly escape.

Revive your senses at The Sanctoo Spa & Wellness facility with a massage or organic facial, or visit Cassowary Restaurant for wholesome Balinese and international dishes with a focus on fresh organic ingredients

When you're ready to explore, hire bikes and cruise through the villages and picturesque plantations. Get up close and personal with the animals that call the neighbouring Bali Zoo home or take the complimentary shuttle to the nearby village of Singapadu, where you will be immersed in the local culture through the restaurants, boutiques and galleries.
offer_address: Jalan Ulun Suwi II, Singapadu, Sukawati, Bali 80582, Indonesia

title: Sophisticated Family-Friendly Ubud Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Nightly Dinner & Unlimited Bali Zoo Access
description:
Indulge in sophisticated jungle bliss at Sanctoo Suites & Villas, a serene sanctuary tucked away in the region of Gianyar, adjacent to Bali Zoo and around 20 minutes from Ubud's centre. This peaceful patch is inspired by nature, with a lagoon pool that mimics the watering holes of the African savannah and tranquil vistas over the Wos River. Revive your senses at The Sanctoo Spa & Wellness facility with a massage or organic facial, or visit Cassowary Restaurant for wholesome Balinese and international dishes with a focus on fresh organic ingredients

When you're ready to explore, hire bikes and cruise through the villages and picturesque plantations. Get up close and personal with the animals that call the neighbouring Bali Zoo home or take the complimentary shuttle to the nearby village of Singapadu, where you will be immersed in the local culture through the restaurants, boutiques and galleries. For something more spiritual, choose a Balinese blessing and cleansing ceremony or welcome the day with a hatha yoga session.
offer_address: Jalan Ulun Suwi II, Singapadu, Sukawati, Bali 80582, Indonesia
